answerText: Prince William Sound[10] Cruise ships in the Prince William Sound can pass through the Cook Inlet to reach Anchorage in this state.
heading: ICCS |2014 | 5 | 4 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: The 1964 Good Friday Earthquake flattened the largest city located on this body of water.  [10] Name this sound that was the site of the Exxon Valdez oil spill.
